title: Announcement, A Matter of Painting: Area MFA Candidates, 1988
title_raw: A Matter of Painting: Area MFA Candidates
medium: Offset lithograph on light gray paper
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center, running upward, sideways: DESIGN: EDWARD FELLA, LULLING IN LIEU OF
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper sheet, center: A MATTER OF PAINTING/*/AREA/ MFA/ CANDIDATES; across center, curved from upper left quadrant to lower right quadrant in five text blocks: first text block: MICHIGAN STATE/ JAMES SNYDER/GORDON BOARDMAN/ CHING-KAN-TSENG; second text block: EASTERN MICHIGAN UNIVERSITY:/ BENITA GOLDMAN; third text block: UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN/ RICHARD CULLING/ SARAH INNES BLOS/ JOEL LONGENECKER; fourth text block: WAYNE STATE UNIVERSITY/ GREGG TARRANT/ LAVERNE FLAKE; fifth text block: CRANBROOK ACADEMY OF ART/ CHRIS DIMMICK/ KURT COLEMAN/ BYRON SHEN; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.;  across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; across lower half of sheet, from center to right edge: MARCH 18-APRIL 15 1988/ CURATOR: GEORGE ORTMAN, DIRECTOR, PAINTING DEPARTMENT, CRANBROOK ACADEMY OF ART/ OPENING RECEPTION:/ FRIDAY MARCH 18, 6-8:30 PM/ ALSO IN THE AREA: DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET OPENING 5-7:30 PM/ GLASS: SCULPTURE AND MIXED MEDIA MARCH 18-APRIL 15
Verso: Imprinted in black, upper right quadrant: SEE; across lower left quadrant: 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY 743 BEAUBIEN/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226/ ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN PEOPLE MOVER STATION; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running downward: WITH THE SUPPORT THE SUPPORT OF/ THE NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR THE ARTS/ THE MICHIGAN COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ DETROIT COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS; across lower right quadrant: NONPROFIT ORG./ BULK RATE/ U.S. POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT MI PERMIT NO. 2960

*The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black, for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Across upper center: text giving title.  Across center, from upper left to lower right, Text giving artists' names curve, contained within two lines. Lower center, circular doodle, text giving curator, reception, and additional information.  Across lower left edge, at various angles, text giving location and contact information. 
Verso: Upper right quadrant, circular doodle resembling a magnifying glass with the word "SEE."  Across center, pattern of punctuation marks.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving sponsor and mailing information, abstract line design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, A Matter of Painting: Area MFA Candidates, 1988. Offset lithograph on light gray paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-25
